title: In Defense of Science by Frank R. Spellman (.epub)
description:
In Defense of Science: Why Scientific Literacy Matters, Second Edition by Frank R. Spellman, Joni Price-Bayer

Requirements: .ePUB reader

Overview: In an era when many in the science community feel that science is under attack, In Defense of Science explains why ordinary citizens need to have an understanding of science, its methods, and its discoveries. The authors debunk several misconceptions of science and scientists, and advocate that science is an integral part of society.

Genre: Non-Fiction > General
